title: New Spiekermann Type
content:
a Preview of a new Typeface from E. Spiekermann. FF Unit, Release July 2003.   
   
 [http://www.macnews.de/media/images/unit.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013053254/http:/www.macnews.de/media/images/unit.jpg)   
   
the new design bureau from spiekermann   
 [http://www.uniteddesigners.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013053254/http:/www.uniteddesigners.com/)
author: typografski
